rationale: Deterministic playback and easy embedding in Next.js web app splash.
Portable JSON-based animation export path (later: iOS/Android can use Lottie runtimes).
Good performance for short logo reveals when kept minimal (no heavy filters).
constraints: No blade geometry edits; use mask/clipPath with locked SVG geometry.
No color edits; overlays must not modify underlying blade spectrum.
Keep particle layer external and density-capped; disable under prefers-reduced-motion.
